title: mobile phone uplink
extract: For cellular devices such as smartphones & tablets, uplink and downlink pertain to the data speed and coverage we know as 3G, 4G LTE, and newer radio frequencies such as 5G. Signal coming to your phone from the cell tower is known as the downlink. Signal leaving your phone back to the cell tower is known as the uplink.Dec 20, 2016
extract_html: For cellular devices such as smartphones & tablets, uplink and downlink pertain to the data speed and coverage we know as 3G, 4G LTE, and newer radio frequencies such as 5G. Signal coming to your phone from the cell tower is known as the downlink. Signal leaving your phone back to the cell tower is known as the uplink.Dec 20, 2016
